description: I've been playing Freeciv versions, presumably the same versions, for years. This download was awful. The graphics were small and dreadfully animated, the script was tiny, and the scenario maps looked like they were from imported directly from the eighties. Previous versions of this very game were by far superior and I'd be interested to know why.
The tiles are too tiny, not usable on high resolution screens.
Pour moi, cette version est la meilleure de toutes.
